["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"此仓库为基于 Debian 的发行版提供了官方打包的 FireFox 浏览器，支持 amd64、arm64 架构。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["目前，Debian 稳定版只包含了长期支持版本 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"firefox-esr"}],"，而 Ubuntu 的 FireFox 切换到了 Snap 包。有需要的用户可使用本仓库提供的 APT 源。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"使用方法","children":"使用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["下面的内容修改自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/install-firefox-linux#w_install-firefox-deb-package-for-debian-based-distributions","rel":"nofollow","children":"Install Firefox on Linux"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先导入和检查 keyring："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}install -d -m 0755 /etc/apt/keyrings
wget -q https://packages.mozilla.org/apt/repo-signing-key.gpg -O- | {{sudo}}tee /etc/apt/keyrings/packages.mozilla.org.asc > /dev/null
gpg -n -q --import --import-options import-show /etc/apt/keyrings/packages.mozilla.org.asc | awk '/pub/{getline; gsub(/^ +| +$/,""); if($0 == "35BAA0B33E9EB396F59CA838C0BA5CE6DC6315A3") print "\nThe key fingerprint matches ("$0").\n"; else print "\nVerification failed: the fingerprint ("$0") does not match the expected one.\n"}'","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"然后添加 APT 源："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/mozilla.list","menus":[{"title":"系统架构","items":[["amd64",{"arch":"amd64"}],["arm64",{"arch":"arm64"}]]}],"code":"deb [arch={{arch}} signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/packages.mozilla.org.asc] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/apt mozilla main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如有需要，配置 APT 优先级："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/preferences.d/mozilla","code":"Package: *
Pin: release a=mozilla
Pin-Priority: 1000","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"更新 APT 缓存并安装："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt update && {{sudo}}apt install firefox
